description:
Description : Acquiring the following items :\n  1. DJI10085 DJI Matrice 300 RTK DRONE \\n        2. DJI10087 DJI TB60 Battery \\n        3. DJI10109 DJI BS60 Intelligent Battery Station \\n        4. DJI10106 DJI Zenmuse L1 \\n        5. DJI10122 DJI Terra Pro Software 1 year 
Country of origin : *Any Country 
 Procedures for obtaining tender are outlined in part 2 bidder  instructions and part 3 bidder preparation instructions.
 Best response from all qualified bidders shall  be selected on lowest evaluated proposal.    
 no ongoing reporting requirements shall be applicable in terms of contract.
Essment
